posts.text:
Keypt 1.09.2009
Toshiba Satellite L300D-242 15.4-Inch Laptop Technical Details:
* CPU: Intel Celeron Processor T1600 1.80 GHz (667 MHz, 1 MB L2)
* Main Memory: 4 GB
* Graphic system: Mobile Intel GMA 4500M 268 Mb UMA
* Display: 15.4 inch Toshiba TruBrite WXGA TFT High Brightness display 1280 x 800
* Webcamera: 0.3 megapixel
* Optical Disc Drive: DVD Super Multi drive (Double Layer)
* Wireless Type: 802.11b/g
* Interfaces: 1 x DC-in, 1 x external monitor, 1 x RJ-11, 1 x RJ-45, 1 x external microphone, 1 x headphone (stereo), 3 x USB 2.0
* Expansion: 2 x memory slots (1 to configure), 1 x ExpressCard slot
* Operating System: Microsoft Windows Vista Home Premium
* Battery: lithium-ion up to 2 h 30 min
* Weight: 5.49 pounds (2.49 kg)
TILBOÐ ÓSKAST
